function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of information on vaccination status","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and spread of infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Encourage respondents to provide vaccination status information","Technologies":"Health status questionnaire, electronic medical records","People":"Survey respondents, public health officials","Owner":"Public health authorities, researchers"},{"Description":"Presence of pre-existing medical conditions","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to contagious diseases and severe health outcomes","Mitigation":"Provide tailored guidance for individuals with pre-existing conditions, promote vaccination","Technologies":"Health surveys, electronic medical records, telemedicine","People":"Individuals with pre-existing conditions, healthcare providers","Owner":"Public health authorities, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"High levels of anxiety and fear related to COVID-19","Impact":"Reduced mental well-being and increased stress levels","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support, offer information on managing COVID-19 fears","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mental health apps, online counseling platforms","People":"General population, individuals with chronic medical conditions","Owner":"Mental health professionals, public health organizations"}]}
